HOW_TO_MANUAL.main_goal: This file is used to automatically generate database source files: db_data.hpp and data_ids.h Each record can have the following fields

possible_records_fields.comment: Add a comment to all files to group records. Optional.
possible_records_fields.index: eIndex to access the element by Database. Mandatory.
possible_records_fields.data_type: Storage data type. Should include namespace if required. Mandatory.
possible_records_fields.task_id: Task ID of the task, that can change this record (one of enum eTaskid element). Mandatory.
possible_records_fields.eeprom_addr: Address to store the paramater in the EEPROM. Not storable, if not specified. Optional.
possible_records_fields.default_value: Initialisation value for the parameter. Mandatory.
possible_records_fields.include: Additional includes for the parameters. Has same notation, as main 'include' section. Optional.
possible_records_fields.internal_name: Additionally specify name inside Database::Storage struct. If not specified, lowercase of eIndex is used. Optional.

storage_format.true: parameter initialization is with assignment ('int k=12')

generator_call.--file_option: JSON file to parse. Default value: 'db_state.json' in the same folder as 'db_generator.py'

HOW_TO_MANUAL.implementation_details: Bottle SimpleTemplate Engine used to generate code file content. For each file to be generated a special template file .tmpl is prepared (see db_geerator/templates/).
HOW_TO_MANUAL.backups: Before generating the database a backup of code files is saved in the folder db_bkp
